relation: Join clubs and activities. Most importantly do things that you enjoy. Do not be afraid to try out for any of the sports.
Food is good. They always have kind people working and are patient when making your meal. There are always little snacks like cookies, ice cream and etc.
It is a very interesting experience. You get to know and learn about people that live on campus from totally different places. Make a lot of new friends and bond rather quickly.
Academics at Elms is awesome. You get to have one on ones with your professor. You are not just a number and a seat on this campus.
Be kind to everyone and others will do the same. Do not be afraid to go out and join clubs. Be active on campus and I promise you will not regret it.
Elms College is a great environment to be in. Not only is it a school but I feel as if this were my second home. I feel completely happy and safe with my choice of college.
pageTitle: Elms College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {100196=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 75273=The food can be good. The grill station, known for its philly cheesesteaks, curly fries, and quesadillas is the best option when other stations are closed/other stations don't look appetizing. It's your best option. There is also a miniature Starbucks/deli if you don't have time for a sit-down lunch. The Starbucks/deli stand closes around 6:30 pm, but the cafeteria has coffee, too. The entrees are hit-and-miss, but the dessert counter, multi-flavor ice cream cooler, and salad bar are always there. You can get omelets and waffles at breakfast and weekend brunch. They have vegan and vegetarian options at each meal.}
